Html:
Hi, I've just upgraded to V1. I notice that the following line of code will now not compile:-

DataFieldTarget = ComboBoxDataFieldTarget.SelectedValue

What should be used instead to sync up with the selected value?

Use SelectedValueBinding of DataGridComboBoxColumn (without setting SelectedItemBinding or TextBinding properties).

The combination of DisplayMemberBinding and DataFieldTarget has been replaced SelectedItemBinding, SelectedValueBinding and TextBinding, to be more in sync with original ComboBox control.
You can also read more about it here, http://blogs.msdn.com/vinsibal/archive/2008/10/31/wpf-datagrid-datagridcomboboxcolumn-v1-intro.aspx.
